org.drip.measure.discretemarginal

Class BoundedUniformIntegerDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.measure.continuousmarginal.R1
      • org.drip.measure.discretemarginal.BoundedUniformIntegerDistribution

  • public class BoundedUniformIntegerDistribution
extends R1
    BoundedUniformIntegerDistribution implements the Univariate Bounded Uniform Integer Distribution, with the Integer being generated between a(n inclusive) lower and an upper Bound.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy

    • Constructor Summary
